luminoscore.graphics.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • luminoscore.graphics.entities.Entity

  • public class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    The entity is a wrapper for positions, rotations, scales, models, and other various data
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nick Clark

      • Entity

        public Entity(org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f position,
              org.lwjgl.util.vector.Vector3f rotation,
              float scale,
              java.util.List<TexturedModel> models)
        Constructor two of the entity. Used when an entity needs multiple models
        Parameters:
        position - Initial position of the entity
        rotation - Initial rotation of the entity
        scale - Initial scale of the entity
        models - Initial List of TexturedModels of the entity
